description: Schema for workout log files representing actual workout performance data

date.description: Datetime in format YYYY-MM-DD-<unix epoch seconds>

session_name.description: Name of the session (must reference a session file in sessions/ directory)

exercises.description: List of exercises performed in this workout

exercise_name.description: Name of the exercise (must reference an exercise file in exercises/ directory)

sets.description: Array of sets performed for this exercise
